snippet: Unleash your inner artist with a new category of pen display tablets, ones that won’t clean out your bank account.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column highlights the new category of pen display tablets, comparing relatively inexpensive tablets from Yiynova with Wacom's $2,000 Cintiq 21UX; holds that the cheaper $300 and $500 models are surprisingly good for the price.
lead_paragraph: Unleash your inner artist with a new category of pen display tablets, ones that won’t clean out your bank account.

headline.seo: The Joy of Drawing on Glass
headline.main: The Joy of Drawing on Glass
headline.print_headline: The Joy Of Drawing On Glass
